title: Princess Nonomi
description: Princess Nonomi is the story of a young and severely troubled woman.Having murdered her parents and burned her home down, Princess Nonomi went from being the outcast of a foster home to a student of a all-girl catholic boarding school. Violent, imaginative, sexual and cruel, Nonomi believes herself to be royalty in the 21st century, a being of divine right meant for greater things. After a savage attack on one of her classmates, Nonomi was committed under the care of Doctor Collins. A year later, sheâ€™s escaped, a free monster heading home.Anyone who crosses her path will get pulled into her maelstrom.
author: Micheal Grin
